component.name: Minus Games Client
component.summary: Download, sync and run a game managed by a Minus Games Server instance

description.p: Using the Minus Games Client, you can download, synchronize, and run your games efficiently. The client manages your game files, ensuring they are always up-to-date with the latest patches and updates. Synchronization across devices allows you to continue your progress seamlessly. This setup provides a reliable and straightforward way to manage your gaming experience.
